menu.title: Fitness Menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product for active and healthy people. This is an entirely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Lenten Menu
menu.descr: The 'Lenten' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk made from almonds, oats, coconut, or buckwheat, the correct amount of protein with tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Premium Menu
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design but also quality execution of the dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
